name: Red Hood of Rogue World
description:
DeckBuilding Rogue-Like Game. 

Player(Red Hood) CAN collect cards and artifacts. 

The Red Hood must defeat the enemy to return to the original world.

You CAN merge TWO cards and make more powerful card.

Also, you can select Class Artifact when defeat stage BOSS. And you can control hero with deference play-style.

language : Korean

Sorry, English Version coming SOON....

v6.61 Bug Fix 

: Fix  text speed more faster in Tutorial .

: Update ESC funtion at non-battle panel.
